thread.title: Overall a very nice hotel
thread.title_full: Overall a very nice hotel - Review of Villa Beaumarchais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Stevexatzi
title: Overall a very nice hotel
text:
Located in Marais, it's ideal for anyone who wants to walk to many places,have a quick access to a metro station and live like a local. Rooms are a little bit small but quite clean.
The stuff is very polite but breakfast leaves somethings to be desired.
I can say that it's a really value for money hotel if you consider the hotel prices in PAris and especially in Marais.
I would saty there for sure.
Room Tip: Prefer the rooms looking at the internal patio. See more room tips
